name: Out Of Control: In Space!
description:
Made for the 48hr GMTK Game Jam 2020
 v1.01: Bug fixes and other miscellaneous fixes Game Info:

Multitasking game about surviving 90 in a damaged space ship.

Controls:
  • Mouse - Dialogue and moving electrons
  • ←↓→ / ASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump

Thanks for playing :)
Play some of the other games from the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/entries
